dmca.title: Digital Millennium Copyright Act Notification
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Smith-Misemer, Dianne M. [mailto:dsmisemer@sonnenschein.com] 
Sent: Thursday, March 03, 2005 5:35 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Digital Millennium Copyright Act Notification



Dear Mr. Crosby:

Attached is a Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") Notification
concerning infringing activity on www.wedplan.net. The infringing site is
hosted by ServerMatrix, a subsidiary of ThePlanet.com.  This DMCA
Notification is being sent to you as the Designated Agent for ThePlanet.com
Internet Services and all its subsidiaries.

We have also tried to fax this DMCA Notification to you at the fax number
listed for you, 214.800.5998., but that number does not appear to be working
at the present time.


If you have any questions, please contact me or one of the other attorneys
handling this case, Rebecca Stroder at (816) 460-2476 or Juliet Cox at (816)
460-2459.

Sincerely,


Dianne Smith-Misemer
Sonnenschein Nath & Rosenthal LLP
4520 Main Street
Suite 1100
Kansas City, Missouri  64111
Phone:  (816) 460-2571
Fax:  (816) 531-7545


-----------------------------------------------------------------------
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTE:
This e-mail and any attachments are confidential and may be protected by
legal privilege. If you are not the intended recipient, be aware

that any disclosure, copying, distribution or use of this e-mail or any

attachment is prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error,

please notify us immediately by returning it to the sender and delete

this copy from your system. Thank you for your cooperation.

SONNENSCHEIN NATH & ROSENTHAL LLP
Visit us on the web at http://www.sonnenschein.com
